summary: A day of uneasy stability. Sleep was better than usual, but overall mental state remains shaky. Workplace stress continues in the background, but you’ve entered a quiet, focused mode of preparation. No major emotional spikes — just slow motion survival with eyes on the exit.

wins: Maintained focus despite unstable work conditions
Rested better than past few days — shows some recovery
losses: Emotional baseline still fragile due to job threat and uncertainty
Progress on personal projects or job applications may have slowed today
ideas: Start your day with a 15-minute 'transition ritual' — coffee, notes, or planning — to steady the mood
Even on quiet days, track *one thing* that moves you closer to freedom (prep, app, idea)

goals: Keep emotional balance steady during job search
Push at least one small piece of career transition each day
